snippet.title: Ys IX: Monstrum Nox - Announcement Trailer (PS5)
snippet.description:
Learn more @ https://play-ys.com/ys-ix

Experience the thrilling adventure of Ys IX: Monstrum Nox as it pierces through the shadows onto PS5™! Renowned adventurer Adol “the Red '' is imprisoned in the city of Balduq, where he falls under a curse and becomes a Monstrum. Now, with his newfound powers, he must stop the Grimwald Nox from consuming the city.

Coming Spring 2023 to PS5!
